00029 class Mob2DFx
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     struct Mob2DShader
00033     {
00034         unsigned int id;
00035         // string filename;
00036         string source;
00037     };
00038 
00039     // For now, this class will just hold the shader program required to draw the image and discard alpha
00040     // fragments.
00041     Mob2DFx()
00042     {
00043         // m_vertexShader.source = vertexShader;
00044         // m_fragmentShader.source = fragmentShader;
00045     }
00046 
00047     virtual ~Mob2DFx() { };
00048 
00049     void unload()
00050     {
00051         glDetachShader(m_programID, m_vertexShader.id);
00052         glDetachShader(m_programID, m_fragmentShader.id);
00053         glDeleteShader(m_vertexShader.id);
00054         glDeleteShader(m_fragmentShader.id);
00055         glDeleteShader(m_programID);
00056     }
00057 
00058     bool initialize()
00059     {
00060         m_programID = glCreateProgram();
00061         m_vertexShader.id = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00062         m_fragmentShader.id = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00063 
00064         // The variables are defined in Mob2DShaderstd::strings.h
00065         // m_vertexShader.source = Mob2D_vertex_shader; // readXML(m_vertexShader.filename);
00066         // m_fragmentShader.source = Mob2D_fragment_shader; // readXML(m_fragmentShader.filename);
00067 
00068         // empty() is a string function
00069         if (m_vertexShader.source.empty() || m_fragmentShader.source.empty())
00070             { return false; }
00071 
00072         const GLchar* tmp = static_cast<const GLchar*>(m_vertexShader.source.c_str());
00073         glShaderSource(m_vertexShader.id, 1, (const GLchar**)&tmp, NULL);
00074 
00075         tmp = static_cast<const GLchar*>(m_fragmentShader.source.c_str());
00076         glShaderSource(m_fragmentShader.id, 1, (const GLchar**)&tmp, NULL);
00077 
00078         if (!compileShader(m_vertexShader) || !compileShader(m_fragmentShader))
00079         {
00080             std::cerr << "Could not compile the shaders, they are invalid" << std::endl;
00081             return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084         glAttachShader(m_programID, m_vertexShader.id);
00085         glAttachShader(m_programID, m_fragmentShader.id);
00086 
00087         glLinkProgram(m_programID);
00088         return true;
00089     }
00090 
00091     void linkProgram()
00092         { glLinkProgram(m_programID); }
00093 
00094     GLuint getUniformLocation(const string& name)
00095     {
00096         map<string, GLuint>::iterator i = m_uniformMap.find(name);
00097         if (i == m_uniformMap.end())
00098         {
00099             GLuint location = glGetUniformLocation(m_programID, name.c_str());
00100             m_uniformMap.insert(std::make_pair(name, location));
00101             return location;
00102         }
00103         return (*i).second;
00104     }
00105 
00106     GLuint getAttribLocation(const string& name)
00107     {
00108         map<string, GLuint>::iterator i = m_attribMap.find(name);
00109         if (i == m_attribMap.end())
00110         {
00111             GLuint location = glGetAttribLocation(m_programID, name.c_str());
00112             m_attribMap.insert(std::make_pair(name, location));
00113             return location;
00114         }
00115 
00116         return (*i).second;
00117     }
00118 
00119     void sendUniform(const string& name, const int id)
00120     {
00121         GLuint location = getUniformLocation(name);
00122         glUniform1i(location, id);
00123     }
00124 
00125     void sendUniform4x4(const string& name, const float* matrix, bool transpose=false)
00126     {
00127         GLuint location = getUniformLocation(name);
00128         glUniformMatrix4fv(location, 1, transpose, matrix);
00129     }
00130 
00131     void sendUniform3x3(const string& name, const float* matrix, bool transpose=false)
00132     {
00133         GLuint location = getUniformLocation(name);
00134         glUniformMatrix3fv(location, 1, transpose, matrix);
00135     }
00136 
00137     void sendUniform(const string& name, const float red, const float green,
00138                      const float blue, const float alpha)
00139     {
00140         GLuint location = getUniformLocation(name);
00141         glUniform4f(location, red, green, blue, alpha);
00142     }
00143 
00144     void sendUniform(const string& name, const float x, const float y,
00145                      const float z)
00146     {
00147         GLuint location = getUniformLocation(name);
00148         glUniform3f(location, x, y, z);
00149     }
00150 
00151     void sendUniform(const string& name, const float scalar)
00152     {
00153         GLuint location = getUniformLocation(name);
00154         glUniform1f(location, scalar);
00155     }
00156 
00157     void bindAttrib(unsigned int index, const string& attribName)
00158     {
00159         glBindAttribLocation(m_programID, index, attribName.c_str());
00160     }
00161 
00162     void bindShader()
00163     {
00164         glUseProgram(m_programID);
00165     }

00169     // Repurpose this to read the XML from the SpriteSheets define file.
00170     /*
00171     string readFile(const string& filename)
00172     {
00173         ifstream fileIn(filename.c_str());
00174 
00175         if (!fileIn.good())
00176         {

00181         return std::stringBuffer;

00184     bool compileShader(const Mob2DShader& shader)
00185     {
00186         glCompileShader(shader.id);
00187         GLint result = 0xDEADBEEF;
00188         glGetShaderiv(shader.id, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &result);
00189 
00190         if (!result)
00191         {
00192             std::cout << "Could not compile shader: " << shader.id << std::endl;
00193             outputShaderLog(shader.id);
00194             return false;
00195         }
00196         return true;
00197     }
00198 
00199     void outputShaderLog(unsigned int shaderID)
00200     {
00201         vector<char> infoLog;
00202         GLint infoLen;
00203         glGetShaderiv(shaderID, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &infoLen);
00204         infoLog.resize(infoLen);
00205 
00206         std::cerr << "GLSL Shader: Shader contains errors, please validate this shader!" << std::endl;
00207         glGetShaderInfoLog(shaderID, sizeof(infoLog), &infoLen, &infoLog[0]);
00208 
00209         std::cerr << string(infoLog.begin(), infoLog.end()) << std::endl;
00210 #ifdef _WIN32
00211         MessageBox(NULL, string(infoLog.begin(), infoLog.end()).c_str(), "Error", MB_OK);
00212 #endif
00213 
00214     }
00215 
00216     Mob2DShader m_vertexShader;
00217     Mob2DShader m_fragmentShader;
00218     unsigned int m_programID;

00220     map<string, GLuint> m_uniformMap;
